name: Albert Einstein
quotes_text: “The world as we have created it is a process of our thinking. It cannot be changed without changing our thinking.”

name: J.K. Rowling
quotes_text: “It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.”

name: Albert Einstein
quotes_text: “There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.”

name: Jane Austen
quotes_text: “The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid.”

name: Marilyn Monroe
quotes_text: “Imperfection is beauty, madness is genius and it's better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring.”

name: Albert Einstein
quotes_text: “Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value.”

name: André Gide
quotes_text: “It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not.”

name: Thomas A. Edison
quotes_text: “I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.”

name: Eleanor Roosevelt
quotes_text: “A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water.”

name: Steve Martin
quotes_text: “A day without sunshine is like, you know, night.”
